title: Collector Spotlight: Chris, Flamingo DAO member
description: "Chris" from Flamingo DAO breaks down his thesis on why long-term holding is the key to value accrual. They also cover the historical importance of key NFTs.
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
itunes:summary: "Chris" from Flamingo DAO breaks down his thesis on why long-term holding is the key to value accrual. They also cover the historical importance of key NFTs.
